data.title: BS in Computer Science
data.subtitle: Babe»ô-Bolyai University of Cluj-Napoca
data.description: Completed a broad computer science curriculum covering algorithms, data structures, databases, operating systems, and web technologies. Gained practical experience in software engineering, systems programming, and project-based labs, developing strong frontend and backend skills. My final project applied computer vision and AI techniques to automate movie scene segmentation, combining theoretical knowledge with real-world problem solving.
